summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rushabh Ventures landing page. All backend APIs (18/18 tests passed) and frontend features working correctly. Forms submit successfully with email notifications confirmed in backend logs.

issues: No navigation links in header - only logo and 'Apply Now' button. Navigation is only available in footer. Consider adding nav links (Home, About, Blog, Contact) to header for better UX.

action_items: Consider adding navigation links to header for better user experience
critical_code_review_comments: Missing data-testid attributes on form inputs - should add for better testability
Header component lacks navigation links - users must scroll to footer to navigate between pages
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix during backend tests (auto-cleaned)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working: /api/contact, /api/application, /api/blog, /api/blog/{slug}. Forms on homepage and contact page submit successfully with email notifications. Blog displays 4 posts from MongoDB. Gmail SMTP integration working with credentials in backend/.env

features_tested.homepage_application_form: PASS - Form submits to /api/application, saves to MongoDB, sends email notification
features_tested.contact_form: PASS - Form submits to /api/contact, saves to MongoDB, sends email notification
features_tested.blog_list_page: PASS - Fetches and displays 4 blog posts from /api/blog
features_tested.blog_single_post: PASS - Displays full article content from /api/blog/{slug}
features_tested.navigation: PASS - Footer links work correctly (Home, About, Blog, Contact)
features_tested.form_validation: PASS - HTML5 validation prevents empty form submission

email_notifications.evidence: Backend logs show successful email sends for both contact and application forms
